transcript.text: This is the story of a youtuber, who told you about the game of his childhood
Which then spoke of his adolescence
And today, will talk about his infancy
Why is no one hipped?
Forgive my voice and my *rfffff* sniffles, I'm a little sick.
Today, I'll talk about my years in primary school because I have a lot of story
Because I've too many INCREDIBLE anecdotes!
Even more incredible when I was a teenager!
We'll begin with the most stupid anecdote of all
I was in math class, among the other students.
I couldn't focus because of my itchy left ear.
Then I look at my pencil, seeing a big potential to scratch
But I also realize that the gum is a bit cracked
Then I set myself a challenge
"Scratching my ear with the eraser side of the pencil without gum remains inside of my ear"
I messed up!
I scratched so hard that pleasure showed on my face
But standing out the pencil, gum was gone
It was in my ear
So I ended the day in the principal's office and tried to look and remove it with a tweezers

Next day, I missed a class because I had to see
a specialized doctor to remove that piece of gum
Maybe everything was planned since the beginning!
I don't know!
Mom, if you watch this video!
I'm sorry!
Moral of the story: Do never challenge yourself between 7 and 11 years because it always ends badly
The second time I launched a challenge to myself
I dunno why I launched challenges, it's completely stupid but I loved it
When i was little, I loved sweets like all children
My mom, like all mothers, hide them in a jar on the fridge
So that I can not reach it

She had forgotten in an apartment, you have chairs
And chairs adds height to your small body of 8 years old
I put a chair, I reach the jar filled with candy, I am happy
And by pulling it to me, I drop it on the floor

I admit, in my life
I've never had so many sweets that day around me
But the problem is, I never had so many pieces of glass around me!!  (OAO''')

And that's WHERE this dumb challenge of a dumb
8-years-old child arrive!
"Alright, if I go down delicately from this chair..."
"I can do a small jump over those pieces of glass and get away safetly"
To the second I jumped from the chair
I literally landed on a piece of glass, buddy!
It pierced the bottom of the big toes
Even now I still have a wound!!
At the time, I wasn't able to tell to my mom tha I hurted myself after doing something forbidden
I was afraid of retaliation!! You understand?

I didn't tell her about that but, dude!
I could have had sutures!
Now there's a gaping hole
Sometimes, when I walk, it hurts because it's dry
And I dunno, I bleed a little
I know, it's really disgusting! Really!!
All of this hard work for candies, jeez!

Yet it was for subscribers or views, I'll understand!
But for sweets, pff....
In primary school, everyone lived isituations that makes them feel REALLY stupid
Or even humiliated
My brother and I have 5 years and half apart

That mean when I started my First Grade, 
he left the Fifth Grade
And by leaving the Primary School, I inherited all of his collection of fashionable toys
Because he wouldn't do anything in Middle School
And being a loser around 8th grade people that make you interessed to them when you're a 5th grade
At our time, our fashion wasn't milk caps or marble
It was Jojo's, man!!
:D

Jojo's are little monsters you can collect
Kinda like pokemon cards
You buy a jojo's bag and you prayed to have a rare one in!

My brother has flared this thing for three years
He was the king of jojo's
The king of the school!!
One night, he offered me a bag filled of jojo's
There were shiny jojo's, dude!  They were fucking rare!
I was so happy,  I say:

"Tomorrow, I'll be the king of the school! I am sure!!
Everyone will give their portion of fries at lunch!!"

11:50, it's play time!
I force to open the bag and then it turns very badly
I messed up the opening of the bag
Everything flied outside of the bag and falls at my feet
There was more jojo's at my feet than candies from the last time I broke the jar
I didn't feel well at all, I was like:
"Shit! Perhaps some of them rolled on the other side of the school that I'll never find!!"
"And coincidentally, it was probably a shiny one!!"
But it was worse....
QAQ
Every students in the courtyard turns to me, one by one
Having the same idea!
At the same time!
In the same place!
Run and stealing Jojo's
I understood their bad intention and plunge on the ground to pick them all as much as possible before them
On 80 jojo's, I saved 30
On 30 of them, there was no more rare jojo's
Second time in my life where I felt very badly, humiliated
It was exactly the same feeling like, when you're in couple with your girlfriend for 10 years and you break up
Yup!

When I was a child, I was a big fan of Lorie 
(note: a french singer)

Of "Ta meilleure amie"
("Your best friend")

Of "Sur un air latino"
("On a latino vibes")

Of "Je vais vite"
("I'm going fast")
*orgasm*
My mom bought a picture of her and my brother mocked me and said I was in love with Lorie
But I wasn't, okay?!
I was mad and I wanted him to respect me so I said:
"No no, I am not fan of Lorie"
I said that at the time but he insisted and said:

"Lucas, I insist, really
I mean... a picture of her under your bed, ahem..."

One day, he gave me a test
A challenge
You know me!! You know what does challenges means when we're only 10!! It's never good!!
"Lucas, are you really not in love with her?"
"Of course no, Florent! Im not a lame guy!
"Hahaha!...Really??
"Of course! For once, respect me a bit, big brother..."
"Alright,prove it me...draw a middle finger on the picture"
...A middle finger!? Why so much violence!?!
I take my courage in both hands
And then, my brother says something that will be etched forever in my memory
He said: "Okay....but I still don't believe you"
I burst into tears, cried with all my strength by touching the picture with the palm of my hand
This beautiful picture of Lorie...
And my brother went outside to play in the yard with his friends, leaving me alone me and my ex
On the primary school, I almost got kidnapped, for real
In the morning, as usually, I went alone to school

I had passed the age when my mother took me
I mean she does sometimes
But yeah, I learned how to go all by myself
And say no to strangers of they approach me and etc...

She did her job of mom perfectly on this!
I wasn't no more naive
I walk and think:

"We gonna learn maths, cool!
Hm...my ear is a bit itchy, let's see later"
(You get it? Cuz you know... xD)
Still walking on the sidewalk, a car appear from nowhere next to me, following my speed
The back door is open and a guy said:
(The sentence the most cliché  of the world)
"So kiddo, going for school? That must really be boring"

"You don't want to come with me instead? 
We can have fun! I have tons of toys and candy at home!

I know you will say it's so cliché and creepy to be real
But it's true!
I remember it perfectly and that disturbed me a lot
So, as a 8-years-old child, I shiet on my pants, literally
In front, I see a woman with a stroller

And by seeing this stroll, that mean she is a mother
And pretend she is my mom

I ran to that woman and scream: "MOM!! MOM!!"
"There's a man proposing me candy inside of his car!!"
She doesn't need more than one second to understand
She stared at the man until he closes the door and flee quickly in his car
And the mother asked if i was okay and if I want to go back at home with her
I said I prefer to go at school

Studies first and foremost
I want to give a good futur to my family
I say no cuz I prefer to reach school and forget what just happened, so I cried on the road and arrived and it's all
The cliche of the guy who offers candy for kids to kidnap them easily is REAL!!
And if your mom didn't sensibilized you after ten or hundred times about that
Well you can't figure it out of the situation and you end up, joinning the guy on his car

You realize, the first youtuber gaming could be Amixem!
It would be annnoying!
Love you Amixeeeem~ ( ˘ ³˘)
We loved airsoft when we were young
I was with my bro on the living room, there was no more furniture (cuz we started to moved) and bored to wait
Having only a airsoft gun as a pastime, I set a bet to him

"Florent?"
"Yes, Lucas?"

"See the ball on the floor at the other side of the room?"
"Yeah?"
"If you can touch it by shooting, I buy you everything"
"You can only use one loader"
He started to act like Rick from Walking Dead and says
"Alright, kiddo. I'll take care of that"

"But promised to offer me a Gibson SG Standard if I can"
And I accepted
He shoots one bullet! Two bullets! Three bullets!
Everyone!! Four bullets!
(It's annoying)
He shoots the last bullet AND succeed to touch the other bullet on miles from us on the floor

My bro looked at me, with Rick's cowbow hat on his head, 
I dunno what happened
"You can offer me when you want but before our death"
after that each year we talked about at least three votes this bet because it made us laugh too much and it was so unlikely
two years ago with the money I earn through youtube thanks to you I was able to surprise her
to offer him a gibson sg standard
That's all my friends, that's the end of this video already !
Don't hesitate to leave a thumbs up if you liked it
I always make me laugh telling things like that, is not much I think
there really with these three videos
we just went around it is not to say if you have experienced something a little bit late or
millien or anything when you were young but not invent something to make interesting is frankly boring on the net there are too many
that and it's a little unnerving I say thank you I help you to carry 13.2 next video you especially well remember says
Always ' no ' when a stranger offers you a candy
